Although most of the pie charts contain food items, the charts themselves represent something *related* to food.
Each pie chart's icon represents a famous work that relates to food somehow.
Kiki's Delivery Service is a book, but is possibly more famously known in a more visual format that applies to all of these charts.
If you aren't sure how to order things, consider how bubble charts work.
Use the varying sizes of the charts as an ordering.
